Name: NSAutoreleasePool
Description: An object that supports Cocoaâ€™s reference-counted memory management system.

InstanceMethods.Name: drain
InstanceMethods.Description: In a reference-counted environment, releases and pops the receiver; in a garbage-collected environment, triggers garbage collection if the memory allocated since the last collection is greater than the current threshold.

InstanceMethods.Name: addObject:
InstanceMethods.Description: Adds a given object to the receiver

TypeMethods.Name: addObject:
TypeMethods.Description: Adds a given object to the active autorelease pool in the current thread.

TypeMethods.Name: showPools
TypeMethods.Description: Displays the state of the current thread's autorelease pool stack to stderr.
